MATCH (b1:Bgp)<-[:HAS_CONFIG]-(c1:Ip4Ctp)-[:IP_CONN]->(c2:Ip4Ctp)-[:HAS_CONFIG]->(b2:Bgp)
WHERE EXISTS((c2)-[:IP_CONN]->(c1))
AND b1.rAddr=c2.ipAddr AND b2.rAddr=c1.ipAddr AND b1.rAsn=b2.lAsn AND b2.rAsn=b1.lAsn AND b1.rId=b2.lId AND b2.rId=b1.lId
WITH DISTINCT b1,b2
CREATE (b1)-[:BGP_PEER]->(b2);

CREATE (nr:AclRule {name:'ACE_DROP', priority: 2, action:'DROP', matching:'["SRC_IP: 20.0.0.0/8"]'})
WITH nr
MATCH (h:Host {name:'border01'})-[:ACL]->(t:Acl{name:'BLK_SSH'})
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:NEXT_RULE*]->(r:AclRule) WHERE NOT EXISTS ((r)-[:NEXT_RULE]->())
WITH DISTINCT nr, t, r
CALL apoc.do.case([
  (t IS NOT null AND r IS NOT null AND nr.action = 'ACCEPT'),
  'CREATE (r)-[:NEXT_RULE]->(nr)-[:ACCEPT]->(t)',
  (t IS NOT null AND r IS NOT null AND nr.action = 'DROP'),
  'CREATE (r)-[:NEXT_RULE]->(nr)',
  (t IS NOT null AND r IS null AND nr.action = 'ACCEPT'),
  'CREATE (t)-[:NEXT_RULE]->(nr)-[:ACCEPT]->(t)',
  (t IS NOT null AND r IS null AND nr.action = 'DROP'),
  'CREATE (t)-[:NEXT_RULE]->(nr)'
  ],
  'DELETE nr',{nr:nr, t:t, r:r})
YIELD value
RETURN value;

CREATE(r:Route {to: '0.0.0.0/0', via: '192.168.200.1', type: 'K>*'}) 
WITH r
MATCH (h:Host {name:'spine03'})-[:CONTAINS]->(l:Ltp{name:'eth0'})-[:CONTAINS*2]->(rEx:Ip4Ctp)
CREATE (r)-[:EGRESS]->(rEx)
WITH r, h
OPTIONAL MATCH (h)-[:ACL]->(ag:Acl)
WITH DISTINCT h, ag, r
CALL apoc.do.case([
  (ag IS NOT null),
  'CREATE (ag)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)'
],
'CREATE (h)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)',{h:h, ag:ag, r:r})
YIELD value
RETURN value;

MATCH (h:Host {name:'spine04'})-[:CONTAINS]->(l:Ltp{name:'Ethernet12'})-[:CONTAINS*2]->(rEx:Ip4Ctp)
CREATE (r)-[:EGRESS]->(rEx)
WITH r, h
OPTIONAL MATCH (h)-[:ACL]->(ag:Acl)
WITH DISTINCT h, ag, r
CALL apoc.do.case([
  (ag IS NOT null),
  'CREATE (ag)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)'
],
'CREATE (h)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)',{h:h, ag:ag, r:r})
YIELD value
RETURN value;

MATCH (h:Host {name:'spine01'})-[:CONTAINS]->(l:Ltp{name:'Ethernet0'})-[:CONTAINS*2]->(rEx:Ip4Ctp)
CREATE (r)-[:EGRESS]->(rEx)
WITH r, h
OPTIONAL MATCH (h)-[:ACL]->(ag:Acl)
WITH DISTINCT h, ag, r
CALL apoc.do.case([
  (ag IS NOT null),
  'CREATE (ag)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)'
],
'CREATE (h)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)',{h:h, ag:ag, r:r})
YIELD value
RETURN value;

CREATE (r)-[:EGRESS]->(rEx)
WITH r, h
OPTIONAL MATCH (h)-[:ACL]->(ag:Acl)
WITH DISTINCT h, ag, r
CALL apoc.do.case([
  (ag IS NOT null),
  'CREATE (ag)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)'
],
'CREATE (h)-[:TO_ROUTE]->(r)',{h:h, ag:ag, r:r})
YIELD value
RETURN value;
